text:
="preserve">William D. "Don" Parkinson (1942 – August 31, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Speaker of the Guam Legislature from 1995 to 1997 and as Majority Leader from 1989 to 1995. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Guam. He was a member of the legislature from 1983 to 1997.
Parkinson died on August 31, 2020, aged 77–78.
